patterns: could i get something to eat
What baked goods do you have
responses:
Here's our menu: 
 Cookies: $2 
 Cupcakes: $4 
 Coffee: $3 
 Cake: Varying prices 
 Bread: 3$ White, Wholewheat, Sour dough 
 We also offer customize cake for special events!
We are open 7am-4pm Monday-Friday! Closed on all holidays.

patterns: Do you have chocolate chip cookies
responses: We have chocolate chip cookies and oatmeal raisin cookies, both are $2 each!
We have chocolate cupcakes and vanilla cupcakes, both are $4 each! $4.5 for both strawberry cupcakes and Matcha cupcakes :)

patterns: Do you have anything to drink
Can I have a cup of coffee with it
responses: We offer coffee with our baked goods, its $3 a cup!

patterns: how can I get to Sakura
What is the address for Sakura
responses: We are at 221B Baker Street accross Lake Regional Park :)

patterns: Can I order a wedding cake
how much would a customized cake cost
I want to customize a cake
responses: We offer cake customization, come to our shop at 221B Baker Street to discuss the details with our cake designers!

patterns: Does the baked goods contain peanuts
make sure nothing contains peanut, I am allergic
I am allergic to diary products
Does anything contain diary? I am lactose intolerant
responses: Non of our product contain any nuts, yet all of our product contain or was made with products that contain diary products.

patterns: Does the baked goods contain gluten
make sure nothing contains gluten, I am allergic
I am on a gluten free diet
responses: Most of our products contain gluten, but we do offer gluten free chocolate chip cookies

patterns: I'm waiting for my order and I'm really bored
tell me a joke while I'm waiting
responses: I'm trying very hard to come up with a baking pun but we don't offer buns :(
one joke is all you knead XD

patterns: How long have you been in operation?
responses: Our founder is secret. We have been open since 2015.

Our founder is secret. We have been open since 2015.
We opened in 2015, thanks to our secret founder.
We have cake, mostly ranging in price from 20-30$. For more information, visit our website BakeSakura.com

patterns: Can you make me something special?
